QuestData.Title: The Cipher of Damnation - Borak's Charge
QuestData.Description: That Cipher fragment will never reach Zuluhed. You're going to ambush Ruul the Darkener and his transport before it has a chance to make the delivery.$B$BThe Dragonmaw Fortress is directly east of here, across the Netherwing Fields. Somewhere between Dragonmaw Fortress and the Sanctum of the Stars is where you'll find Ruul. Strike hard and strike fast! And $n, from the sound of it, this Ruul is going to be tough. Keep your guard up.$B$BReturn the Cipher to me should you succeed.
QuestData.LogDescription: Borak, Son of Oronok at the bridge near Eclipse Point in Shadowmoon Valley wants you to recover the Third Part of the Cipher of Damnation from Ruul the Darkener.$B$BThis mission will require a group.
QuestData.RewardText: Finally! The cipher fragment is ours!$B$B<Borak places the fragment into a box.>
